name: com.unity.services.push-notifications
description: This package adds support for Push Notifications to your game. It allows sending rich push notifications with images, and provides analytics on the number of received push notifications.

samples.description: This basic sample registers for push notifications on each supported platform, and logs when notifications are received.

upm.changelog:
### Fixed

* Android plugin now uses a named Firebase instance to avoid clashing with any default instances already in the project.
